name: places/ChIJ9T8N2iX2wokRuv3CNzgpQz8
adrFormatAddress: 2662 Broadway, New York, NY 10025-5026, USA

originalText.text:
I broke my glasses during my trip to New York and this was the closest store near me. Not only they let me in before the store opened, but also explained in detail why it happened, and how to fix it.

I was expecting a huge bill for the repair but the total was really cheap and affordable. He also let me have the cloth wipe, and we had a good conversation. Highly recommended!

text.text:

originalText.text: I took my son to get his glasses here and I was so impressed by the spectacular customer service of both the staff and the owner. I even went back to get my eyes checked and order contact lenses. In a world where it's so easy to buy everything online, I have chosen to support this wonderful local business instead.

text.text: I took my son to get his glasses here and I was so impressed by the spectacular customer service of both the staff and the owner. I even went back to get my eyes checked and order contact lenses. In a world where it's so easy to buy everything online, I have chosen to support this wonderful local business instead.

originalText.text: Honestly, the best customer service experience I've ever encountered in my 24 years of wearing eyeglasses. I had to pick out my son's first pair of glasses, which in of itself is pretty daunting of a task, but Justin helped me out and gave me advice on which frames would work best for a growing child. My son had a wonderful experience at the store and acclimated to his new frames so quickly I was shocked. I definitely would recommend Angel Eyes and I'm definitely coming back.

text.text: Honestly, the best customer service experience I've ever encountered in my 24 years of wearing eyeglasses. originalText.text: My glasses' screw was loosened, so I went here to fix it. The guy at the front fixed the problem in a second for free! Coolest guy I ever seen. I would definitely visit here if I need a new pair of glasses.

text.text: My glasses' screw was loosened, so I went here to fix it. The guy at the front fixed the problem in a second for free! Coolest guy I ever seen. I would definitely visit here if I need a new pair of glasses.

originalText.text: Walked in yesterday for the first time because I really needed my glasses adjusted and the people who fitted my frames were both so incredible! Kind, patient, informed, explained everything thoroughly, and definitely experienced. So glad I walked into Angel Eyes Optical yesterday! Highly recommend to anyone who appreciates expertise in everything glasses-related. Thank you!
